J.Bin

Korean: 제이빈

5'7" (171 cm)
Group (2015-2019):
WANNA.B until Jan 1, 2015
Group (2016-2020):
MOXIE

Introduction

J.BIN is a South Korean singer under Urban Entertainment. She is a member of the Korean pop duo MOXIE. She was in the pre-debut lineup of WANNA.B.
She left early 2015 after the release of "My Type" pre-debut single.

Nov 17, 2014

active
